reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress classy, elegant, and comfortable, with soft material that drapes beautifully. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality, with one customer noting it's perfect for spring and summer, while another mentions it's ideal for cooler weather. The fit receives mixed reviews, with some finding it perfect while others say it's too big, and the fabric weight is also mixed, with some appreciat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dress.
items.body: Very cute and comfy. Has kind of a T-shirt type of material. Can easily be dressed up with heels and fancier jewelry or can be dressed down with sandals/sneakers and a denim jacket. I ordered the green and the color is very vibrant. The material was loose and seemed to really flow. It is true to size. Just the right thickness of the material not too warm and not too cool. Not to see-through at all. it has a great length to it. I am 5‘7“ and it hit about midcalf. Will buy in other colors. Read more
items.author: UNDMOM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning, sleek, elegant, comfortable, durable.
items.body: My daughter wore this for her formal code Christmas concert and it suited her so well. She is 5'3.5 110 pounds wearing adult size small and found it to be extremely comfortable and beautiful on her. I will say that if you have a belly, this dress will show every curve of it which may not be flattering if you're more like me, a mama, haha. It also seems to be a little tight or 'shaped to skin' in the bust, which could be psychologically uncomfortable for some as my younger teen found out, but extremely flattering for slimmer body types if you don't mind. (We are a prudish family who tend not to 'show off'.) If you're on the small side and struggling to find a flattering dress, this is a 10/10 choice. We have no complaints with the make or quality and have used it for 4 events. Just wash it on a gentle, minimal setting, and lint roll it after drying. It didn't fade so far after about 5 washes and while our expectations were not very high, it's super nice the dress is still as good as new. Also do not hang on the indents on the hanger, which might stress the fabric- fold it over the bar ideally. It wont wrinkle from being draped. Read more
items.author: Phoenix B.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and has pockets!!!
items.body: Loved everything about this dress and the fact it has pockets well!!!! Material is nice and the fit is perfect. It is a bit heavy but otherwise perfect Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, if you're stick thin
items.body: I ordered the purple and the hit pink, thinking it might be forgiving for those of us with a few extra pounds, but it is not. I love the softness of the material but it is a clingy material so any bodily flaw is very apparent. Bummed because I love the style, colors, and length, and the material.... I would just need to be a few pounds less to look good in it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very lovely dress for a special occasion
items.body: This is such a beautiful dress for a special occasion, I.e. wedding, graduation, outdoor party. The fabric flows beautifully and I bought it in the light purple which is really pretty for spring and summer. The cut is flattering, however,it does run long so if you’re tall, it’s fine, I’m 5’8”. Otherwise you’ll need to shorten it or wear heels. The skirt is very full which gives it a lovely flow. This is a great dress for the price and is flattering too! Read more
items.author: kathymusic1971

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Blend of Comfort and Elegance
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I bought this dress for my mom, who is a stylish and youthful 80-year-old. She is about 5’7” and 135 lbs, and the fit was just right. The fabric is soft, stretchy, and high quality—neither too warm nor too cold, making it perfect for various occasions. One of the best features is that the dress doesn’t wrinkle. We had it pressed once, and it has maintained its polished look ever since. It’s both comfortable and elegant, which she absolutely loves. The addition of pockets is a thoughtful and practical touch. Read more
items.author: Simona

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this dress!
items.body: This dress fits perfectly. The material is soft and feels comfortable. It’s one of my favorite pieces. Read more
items.author: Leah S

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute relaxed yet elegant dress but there seemed to be something wrong with the assembly.
items.body: I needed a modest dress for a religious wedding and this looked perfect. Until I put it on. There seemed to be a mistake with the assembly of the dress I received. The front of the neckline was quite high - it could cover part of my face if I lifted it up. The material is soft so it laid around my neck like a cowl. The back of the neckline sat a bit low. So I decided to try the dress on backward -- and the top fit soooo much better. But then I had a sewn in label at my neck and the skirt's backseam now went down the front taking away from its elegance. I would have asked for a replacement as it was a nice dress -- but I didn't have enough time. The simple flattering shape, flowing skirt with a waist band, and stretch material made it a nice dress that could be dressed up or down. Perhaps I'll give them another try at some point to see if that dress was a one off. Read more
items.author: CathyC

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Sky, Brown, Navy, Pink, Rust, Sand, Bean Green, Purple, Rose, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
